name: purified water, ophthalmic
other_names: Bausch & Lomb Advanced Eye Relief - Eye Wash
Collyrium for Fresh Eyes Eye Wash

common: Pregnant or breastfeeding patients should seek advice of health professional before using OTC drugs
Lactation: Consult a health professional before using in breast-feeding women.
Lactation: Consult a health professional before using in breast-feeding women.
Hypersensitivity to any component of the formulation
Do not use if you have open wounds in or near the eyes; get medical help right away
Do not use if solution changes color or becomes cloudy
Stop use and ask physician if you experience eye pain, changes in vision, continued redness or irritation of the eye; condition worsens or persists
